title: King Crimson 2015-12-10 Tokyo Japan Orchard Hall 16 44 FLAC8
description:
King Crimson
Orchard Hall
Tokyo, Japan
December 10, 2015

recording: DPA4061 > battery box > PCM M10 (wav 24/96)
transfer: PCM M10 > USB > PC > TLH > flac > torrent > me
mastering: flac files @ 24/96 > TLH > wav 24/96 > Adobe Audition 3 (edit 1 oversize file into 2 smaller files) > wav 24/96 > Wavelab 5.01b (editing, mastering plugin host - see below for details) > 24/96 wav semi-mastered files > iZotope RX Advanced 2 DeClick (applause reduction) > 24/96 wav final master files > Wavelab 5.01b (final tracking) > 24/96 wav files split amd mastered version RM6i > Foobar2000 (SoX resampler to 24/44.1, 95.2% passband 25% phase response no aliasing) > iZotope RX Advanced 2 (mBit+ dither to 16/44.1, ultra noise shaping high dither) > TLH > flac8 > Foobar2000 (tagging)

CD ready Redbook friendly 16 bit 44.1 khz version.

Note: There is some hiss noise similar to what you would hear from tape background sound present in this digital recording. I have attempted to apply some very light and non-damaging noise reduction to this recording without damaging the music or creating strange digital artifacts. The noise that remains is only really audible in the quietest passages and is easily overpowered by the loudest ones. It should not deter you from enjoying the performance or the very good recording contained within. Enjoy.
